name: Joseph Todd THOMPSON, Executor of the Estate of Charles Frost, Deceased, and Margie Frost, Widow in her Own Right v. CROUSE-HINDS and Graybar Electric Company, Inc. Petition of Graybar Electric Company

parties: Joseph Todd THOMPSON, Executor of the Estate of Charles Frost, Deceased, and Margie Frost, Widow in her Own Right v. CROUSE-HINDS and Graybar Electric Company, Inc. Petition of Graybar Electric Company.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of November, 2012, the Application for Late Joinder in Crouse-Hinds Corporation’s Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
55 A.3d 1056
Joseph Todd THOMPSON, Executor of the Estate of Charles Frost, Deceased, and Margie Frost, Widow in her Own Right v. CROUSE-HINDS and Graybar Electric Company, Inc. Petition of Graybar Electric Company.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 13, 2012.
